bio: Morthal's spectral murmur cradles my journey as Ueldon Yewful, a Skeleton thief, on a quest to emerge as Skyrim's shadowy paragon. Proficient in lockpicking and pickpocketing, the specter of fire's embrace within Morthal becomes the crucible where my skeletal form confronts and conquers the elemental fear that once haunted me.
name: Ueldon Yewful
